What is the difference between let and const in JavaScript?
options: let variables can be reassigned, while const variables cannot
const variables can be reassigned, while let variables cannot
let variables have function scope, while const variables have block scope
const variables have function scope, while let variables have block scope
answer: let variables can be reassigned, while const variables cannot
